text: Temple College VN Program Nursing Article Rubric VNSG 1460: Clinical-LVN Training II Objective: Using clinical reasoning using evidence-based resources as a basis for decision-making in nursing practice. Assignment is graded as outlined in the Rubric below. Make sure each paragraph contains the minimum number of sentences Evaluation Rubric Score Paragraph 1 • Paragraph is at least 3 sentences Provide the below information in sentence format • Title of article (4 points) • Name of author (4 points) • Year article was published (4 points) • Name of journal (4 points) • Explained why it is important to read & use EBP articles when making nursing decisions in clinical practice (4 points) Paragraph 2 • Paragraph is at least 3 sentences Summarize in your own words what the article was about. • Paragraph accurately describes what the article was about (10 points) • Paragraph uses correct grammar and spelling (5 points) Paragraph 3 • Paragraph is at least 5 sentences How can you use what you learned from the article in the clinical setting? • Paragraph describing how the student could use what they learned from the article in the clinical setting (20 points) • Paragraph includes at least two (2) applications learned from the article to the clinical setting (20 points) • Paragraph uses correct grammar and spelling (5 points) Nursing Article Summary Presentation Presenting your article to your classmates. • Presentation includes article title, author, journal, and year of publishing (4 points) • Presentation was understandable and accurately described what the article was about (4 points) • Presentation shared at least two applications learned from the article to the clinical setting (4 points) • Presenter was actively engaged in answering questions, making eye contact, and speaking clearly (4 points) Overall Evaluation and Score Rev. 8/1/23 AX
